name: Unica Road Construction
description: Unica Roads Crew receive 0.6 Euro for every Stone Road they place and 1.2 Euro for every Asphalt Road they place on capital roads. NOTE: this does NOT include the cost of the road itself. This is the reward for the action of placing the road down. Everything else will be supplied by the Government of Unica.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon>: Was the block constructed or deconstructed?

Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

properties.Title: Payout (Non-City)
properties.UserDescription: Pay citizens for road placement outside of the city.

<ecoicon item="CitizenTimer">Hours Since Last Trigger</ecoicon>: Time until the next trigger, represented in hours.
